title: Our Solutions
digitalTwinDesc: Real-time 3D visualization and simulation for industry.
digitalTwinDetail: Our Digital Twin Platform enables real-time 3D visualization, simulation, and monitoring for industrial and real estate scenarios. Integrate with IoT, BIM, and more to create a true digital mirror of your assets.
aiChatDesc: Intelligent Q&A and workflow automation powered by GPT-4.
aiChatDetail: The AI Chat Assistant leverages GPT-4 to provide smart Q&A, automate business workflows, and enhance customer engagement. Easily integrate with your website or app for a seamless experience.
